sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_21e8633bdbfa720030237d9ebf96198c
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>true</action_delete><action_insert>false</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>false</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>sys_user_group</collection><condition>current.name.toString() !== ""</condition><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition/><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>OpsGenie Delete Team</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) {
	var client = new OpsGenie_Client();
	
	if (client.syncUsersAndGroupsWithOpsGenie) {
		var teamName = client.replaceForbiddenCharacters(current.name.toString());
		client.deleteTeamFromOpsGenie("/" + teamName, "name" );
	}
})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2017-05-25 07:37:33</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>21e8633bdbfa720030237d9ebf96198c</sys_id><sys_mod_count>8</sys_mod_count><sys_name>OpsGenie Delete Team</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="OpsGenie" source="x_86994_opsgenie">98838612db00320030237d9ebf9619ae</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="OpsGenie">98838612db00320030237d9ebf9619ae</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_21e8633bdbfa720030237d9ebf96198c</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2018-11-27 10:23:15</sys_updated_on><template/><when>after</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=21e8633bdbfa720030237d9ebf96198c"/></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_include_50a78ad2db00320030237d9ebf961976
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>public</access><active>true</active><api_name>x_86994_opsgenie.OpsGenie_Client</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>false</client_callable><description/><name>OpsGenie_Client</name><script><![CDATA[var OpsGenie_Client = Class.create();

OpsGenie_Client.prototype = {
    initialize: function() {
		this.apiKey = gs.getProperty('x_86994_opsgenie.api.key', '');
		this.endpoint = gs.getProperty('x_86994_opsgenie.api.url', 'https://api.opsgenie.com');
		this.useAcknowledgeInsteadOfAssign = gs.getProperty('x_86994_opsgenie.use.acknowledge', false) === 'true' ? true : false;
		this.syncUsersAndGroupsWithOpsGenie = gs.getProperty('x_86994_opsgenie.use.sync', false) === 'true' ? true : false;
    },
	
	postToOpsGenie: function(contentMap) {
		try {
			var rest = new sn_ws.RESTMessageV2('x_86994_opsgenie.OpsGenie Webhook', 'post');
			rest.setQueryParameter("apiKey", this.apiKey);
			rest.setStringParameter("endPoint", this.endpoint);
			rest.setRequestHeader("Content-Type", "application/json");
			var content = new global.JSON().encode(contentMap);
		
			rest.setRequestBody(content);

			gs.debug("Posting to " + rest.getEndpoint() + " content: " + content);
			var response = rest.execute();
			var responseBody = response.getBody();
			var httpStatus = response.getStatusCode();

			var responseLogMessage = "Response status: " + httpStatus + ", body: " + responseBody;
			
			if(!httpStatus.toString().startsWith("2")){
				gs.error(responseLogMessage);
			} else{
				gs.debug(responseLogMessage);
			}
		}
		catch(ex) {
			var message = ex.getMessage();
			gs.error("Exception occured: ", ex);
		}
	},
	
	postToOpsGenieAlertAPI: function(contentMap, subEndpoint, identifierType) {
		try {
			var rest = new sn_ws.RESTMessageV2('x_86994_opsgenie.OpsGenie Alert API Endpoint', 'post');
			rest.setRequestHeader("Authorization", "GenieKey " + this.apiKey);
			
			if(identifierType !== ""){
				rest.setQueryParameter("identifierType", identifierType);
			}
			
			rest.setStringParameter("endPoint", this.endpoint);
			rest.setStringParameter("subEndPoint", subEndpoint);
			rest.setRequestHeader("Content-Type", "application/json");
			
			var content = new global.JSON().encode(contentMap);
			rest.setRequestBody(content);

			gs.debug("Posting to " + rest.getEndpoint() + " content: " + content);
			var response = rest.execute();
			var responseBody = response.getBody();
			var httpStatus = response.getStatusCode();

			var responseLogMessage = "Response status: " + httpStatus + ", body: " + responseBody;
			
			if(!httpStatus.toString().startsWith("2")){
				gs.error(responseLogMessage);
			} else{
				gs.debug(responseLogMessage);
			}
		}
		catch(ex) {
			var message = ex.getMessage();
			gs.error("Exception occured: ", ex);
		}
	},
	
	postToOpsGenieUserAPI: function(contentMap, subEndpoint) {
		try {
			var rest = new sn_ws.RESTMessageV2('x_86994_opsgenie.OpsGenie User API Endpoint', 'post');
			rest.setRequestHeader("Authorization", "GenieKey " + this.apiKey);
			rest.setStringParameter("endPoint", this.endpoint);
			rest.setStringParameter("subEndPoint", subEndpoint);
			rest.setRequestHeader("Content-Type", "application/json");
			
			var content = new global.JSON().encode(contentMap);
			rest.setRequestBody(content);

			gs.debug("Posting to " + rest.getEndpoint() + " content: " + content);
			var response = rest.execute();
			var responseBody = response.getBody();
			var httpStatus = response.getStatusCode();

			var responseLogMessage = "Response status: " + httpStatus + ", body: " + responseBody;
			
			if(!httpStatus.toString().startsWith("2")){
				gs.error(responseLogMessage);
			} else{
				gs.debug(responseLogMessage);
			}
			
			return response;
		}
		catch(ex) {
			var message = ex.getMessage();
			gs.error("[OpsGenie_Client] Exception occured: ", ex);
		}
	},
	
	patchToOpsGenieUserAPI: function(contentMap, subEndpoint) {
		try {
			var rest = new sn_ws.RESTMessageV2('x_86994_opsgenie.OpsGenie User API Endpoint', 'patch');
			rest.setRequestHeader("Authorization", "GenieKey " + this.apiKey);
			rest.setStringParameter("endPoint", this.endpoint);
			rest.setStringParameter("subEndPoint", subEndpoint);
			rest.setRequestHeader("Content-Type", "application/json");
			
			var content = new global.JSON().encode(contentMap);
			rest.setRequestBody(content);

			gs.debug("Posting to " + rest.getEndpoint() + " content: " + content);
			var response = rest.execute();
			var responseBody = response.getBody();
			var httpStatus = response.getStatusCode();

			var responseLogMessage = "Response status: " + httpStatus + ", body: " + responseBody;
			
			if(!httpStatus.toString().startsWith("2")){
				gs.error(responseLogMessage);
			} else{
				gs.debug(responseLogMessage);
			}
			
			return response;
		}
		catch(ex) {
			var message = ex.getMessage();
			gs.error("[OpsGenie_Client] Exception occured: ", ex);
		}
	},
	
	postToOpsGenieTeamAPI: function(contentMap, subEndpoint, teamIdentifierType) {
		try {
			var rest = new sn_ws.RESTMessageV2('x_86994_opsgenie.OpsGenie Team API Endpoint', 'post');
			rest.setRequestHeader("Authorization", "GenieKey " + this.apiKey);
			
			if(teamIdentifierType !== ""){
				rest.setQueryParameter("teamIdentifierType", teamIdentifierType);				
			}
			
			rest.setStringParameter("endPoint", this.endpoint);
			rest.setStringParameter("subEndPoint", subEndpoint);
			rest.setRequestHeader("Content-Type", "application/json");
			
			var content = new global.JSON().encode(contentMap);
			rest.setRequestBody(content);

			gs.debug("Posting to " + rest.getEndpoint() + " content: " + content);
			var response = rest.execute();
			var responseBody = response.getBody();
			var httpStatus = response.getStatusCode();

			var responseLogMessage = "Response status: " + httpStatus + ", body: " + responseBody;
			
			if(!httpStatus.toString().startsWith("2")){
				gs.error(responseLogMessage);
			} else{
				gs.debug(responseLogMessage);
			}
			
			return response;
		}
		catch(ex) {
			var message = ex.getMessage();
			gs.error("Exception occured: ", ex);
		}
	},
	
	deleteUserFromOpsGenie: function(subEndPoint) {
		try {
			var rest = new sn_ws.RESTMessageV2('x_86994_opsgenie.OpsGenie User API Endpoint', 'delete');
            rest.setStringParameter("endPoint", this.endpoint);
			rest.setStringParameter("subEndPoint", subEndPoint);
			rest.setRequestHeader("Authorization", "GenieKey " + this.apiKey);

			gs.debug("Sending delete request to " + rest.getEndpoint());
			rest.executeAsync();
		}
		catch(ex) {
			var message = ex.getMessage();
			gs.error("Exception occured: ", ex);
		}
	},
	
	deleteTeamFromOpsGenie: function(subEndPoint, identifierType) {
		try {
			var rest = new sn_ws.RESTMessageV2('x_86994_opsgenie.OpsGenie Team API Endpoint', 'delete');
			rest.setRequestHeader("Authorization", "GenieKey " + this.apiKey);
            rest.setStringParameter("endPoint", this.endpoint);
			
			if(identifierType !== ""){
				rest.setQueryParameter("identifierType", identifierType);
			}
			
			rest.setStringParameter("subEndPoint", subEndPoint);

			gs.debug("Sending delete request to " + rest.getEndpoint());
			rest.executeAsync();
		}
		catch(ex) {
			var message = ex.getMessage();
			gs.error("Exception occured: ", ex);
		}
	},
	
	deleteTeamMemberFromTeamInOpsGenie: function(teamName, userId, identifierType) {
		try {
			var rest = new sn_ws.RESTMessageV2('x_86994_opsgenie.OpsGenie Team API Endpoint', 'delete');
			rest.setRequestHeader("Authorization", "GenieKey " + this.apiKey);
            rest.setStringParameter("endPoint", this.endpoint);
			
			if(identifierType !== ""){
				rest.setQueryParameter("teamIdentifierType", identifierType);
			}
			
			var formedSubEndPoint = "/" + teamName + "/members/" + userId;
			rest.setStringParameter("subEndPoint", formedSubEndPoint);

			gs.debug("Sending delete request to " + rest.getEndpoint());
			rest.executeAsync();
		}
		catch(ex) {
			var message = ex.getMessage();
			gs.error("Exception occured: ", ex);
		}
	},
	
	formatPhoneNumber: function(number) {
		number = number
			.replace(/\(/g, "")
			.replace(/\)/g, "")
			.replace(/\-/g, "")
			.replace(/\//g, "")
			.replace(/\+/g, "")
			.replace(/\ /g, "");
		
		if (number.length > 10) {
			number = number.substring(0, number.length - 10) + "-" + number.substring(number.length - 10, number.length);
		} else {
			number = "1-" + number;
		}
		
		return number;
	},
	
	replaceForbiddenCharacters: function(teamName) {
		teamName = teamName.replace(/[^A-Za-z0-9_.\- ]+/g, "_");
		return teamName;
	},
	
	postToWebService: function(webServiceName, body) {
		var requestUrl = gs.getProperty('glide.servlet.uri') + "api/now/import/" + webServiceName;
		
		var bodyJSON = new global.JSON().encode(body);
		gs.info("[OpsGenie_Client-postToWebService] Making request to " + requestUrl + " with content: " + bodyJSON);

		var webServiceRequest = new sn_ws.RESTMessageV2();
		webServiceRequest.setEndpoint(requestUrl);
		webServiceRequest.setHttpMethod('POST');
		webServiceRequest.setRequestHeader("Accept","application/json");
		webServiceRequest.setRequestHeader('Content-Type','application/json');
		webServiceRequest.setRequestBody(bodyJSON);

		return webServiceRequest.execute();
	},
	
	queryEntity: function(tableName, queryFieldName, queryValue) {
		var entity = new GlideRecord(tableName);
		entity.addQuery(queryFieldName, queryValue);
		entity.query();
		
		if (entity.next()) {
			return entity;
		} else {
			return undefined;
		}
	},
	
	getAlertFromOpsGenie: function(alertId) {
		try {
			var rest = new sn_ws.RESTMessageV2('x_86994_opsgenie.OpsGenie Alert API Endpoint', 'get');
			rest.setRequestHeader("Authorization", "GenieKey " + this.apiKey);
			rest.setStringParameter("endPoint", this.endpoint);
			rest.setStringParameter("subEndPoint", "/" + alertId);
			rest.setRequestHeader("Content-Type", "application/json");
			
			gs.debug("Sending GetAlert request to " + rest.getEndpoint());
			var response = rest.execute();
			var responseBody = response.getBody();
			var httpStatus = response.getStatusCode();
			
			var responseLogMessage = "Response status: " + httpStatus + ", body: " + responseBody;
			
			if(!httpStatus.toString().startsWith("2")) {
				gs.error(responseLogMessage);
				return "";
			} else {
				gs.debug(responseLogMessage);
				return responseBody;
			}
		} catch(ex) {
			var message = ex.getMessage();
			gs.error("Exception occurred: ", ex);
		}
	},
	
    type: 'OpsGenie_Client'
};]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2017-01-03 15:42:31</sys_created_on><sys_id>50a78ad2db00320030237d9ebf961976</sys_id><sys_mod_count>142</sys_mod_count><sys_name>OpsGenie_Client</sys_name><sys_package display_value="OpsGenie" source="x_86994_opsgenie">98838612db00320030237d9ebf9619ae</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="OpsGenie">98838612db00320030237d9ebf9619ae</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_50a78ad2db00320030237d9ebf961976</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2018-11-27 10:08:06</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_cab48e52db00320030237d9ebf961984
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>false</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>true</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>incident</collection><condition>current.assignment_group.name !== ""</condition><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition table="incident">assignment_groupVALCHANGES^EQ<item endquery="false" field="assignment_group" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="VALCHANGES" or="false" value=""/><item endquery="true" field="" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value=""/></filter_condition><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>OpsGenie Add Team</name><order>3</order><priority>1</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) {
	var client = new OpsGenie_Client();
	var alertAlias = current.x_86994_opsgenie_alert_alias.toString();
	var teamName = client.replaceForbiddenCharacters(current.assignment_group.name.toString());
	
	var contentMap = {
		"team": {
			"name": teamName
		}
	};
	
	client.postToOpsGenieAlertAPI(contentMap, "/" + alertAlias + "/teams", "alias");
})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2017-01-03 15:30:30</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>cab48e52db00320030237d9ebf961984</sys_id><sys_mod_count>20</sys_mod_count><sys_name>OpsGenie Add Team</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="OpsGenie" source="x_86994_opsgenie">98838612db00320030237d9ebf9619ae</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="OpsGenie">98838612db00320030237d9ebf9619ae</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_cab48e52db00320030237d9ebf961984</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2018-11-27 10:21:45</sys_updated_on><template/><when>async</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=cab48e52db00320030237d9ebf961984"/></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_4da38a52db00320030237d9ebf9619e4
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>false</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>true</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>incident</collection><condition>current.assigned_to.email.toString() !== ""</condition><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition table="incident">assigned_toVALCHANGES^EQ<item endquery="false" field="assigned_to" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="VALCHANGES" or="false" value=""/><item endquery="true" field="" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value=""/></filter_condition><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>OpsGenie Assign Alert</name><order>4</order><priority>1</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) {
	var client = new OpsGenie_Client();
	var alertAlias = current.x_86994_opsgenie_alert_alias.toString();
	
	if (client.useAcknowledgeInsteadOfAssign) {
		var contentMapAck = {
			"state": "Acknowledged",
			"user": current.assigned_to.email.toString(),
			"incidentNumber": current.number.toString()
		};
		
		if (alertAlias !== "") {
			contentMapAck.alias = alertAlias.toString();
		} else {
			contentMapAck.alias = current.number.toString();
		}

		client.postToOpsGenie(contentMapAck);
	} else {
		var contentMapAssign = {
			"owner": {
				"username": current.assigned_to.email.toString()
			}
		};

		if (alertAlias !== "") {
			contentMapAssign.alias = alertAlias.toString();
		} else {
			contentMapAssign.alias = current.number.toString();
		}

		client.postToOpsGenieAlertAPI(contentMapAssign, "/" + contentMapAssign.alias + "/assign", "alias");
	}
})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2017-01-03 15:26:01</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>4da38a52db00320030237d9ebf9619e4</sys_id><sys_mod_count>21</sys_mod_count><sys_name>OpsGenie Assign Alert</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="OpsGenie" source="x_86994_opsgenie">98838612db00320030237d9ebf9619ae</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="OpsGenie">98838612db00320030237d9ebf9619ae</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_4da38a52db00320030237d9ebf9619e4</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2017-11-02 06:18:34</sys_updated_on><template/><when>async</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=4da38a52db00320030237d9ebf9619e4"/></record_update>

sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_transform_entry"><sys_transform_entry action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><choice_action>ignore</choice_action><coalesce>false</coalesce><coalesce_case_sensitive>false</coalesce_case_sensitive><coalesce_empty_fields>false</coalesce_empty_fields><date_format>yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss</date_format><map display_value="OpsGenie Web Svc Assign Group">a2567bc6dbe1cf00b8755a77dc961915</map><reference_value_field/><source_field>[Script]</source_field><source_script><![CDATA[answer = (function transformEntry(source) {
	var client = new OpsGenie_Client();
	var groupName = source.u_assigned_group;

	if (groupName !== "") {
		var groupEntity = client.queryEntity('sys_user_group', 'name', groupName);

		if (groupEntity !== undefined) {
			return groupEntity.sys_id.toString();
		}
	}
	
	return "";
})(source);]]></source_script><source_table>x_86994_opsgenie_opsgenie_web_svc_assign</source_table><sys_class_name>sys_transform_entry</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2017-10-06 11:44:30</sys_created_on><sys_id>36086647db21034031fc540adc9619b7</sys_id><sys_mod_count>3</sys_mod_count><sys_name>[Script]</sys_name><sys_package display_value="OpsGenie" source="x_86994_opsgenie">98838612db00320030237d9ebf9619ae</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="OpsGenie">98838612db00320030237d9ebf9619ae</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_transform_entry_36086647db21034031fc540adc9619b7</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2017-10-20 15:32:41</sys_updated_on><target_field>assignment_group</target_field><target_table>incident</target_table><use_source_script>true</use_source_script></sys_transform_entry></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_fa0b6b9bdb26320030237d9ebf96195a
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>false</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>true</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>incident</collection><condition>current.comments.getJournalEntry(1) !== ""</condition><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition table="incident">commentsVALCHANGES^EQ<item endquery="false" field="comments" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="VALCHANGES" or="false" value=""/><item endquery="true" field="" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value=""/></filter_condition><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>OpsGenie Add Comment</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) {
	var client = new OpsGenie_Client();
	var alertAlias = current.x_86994_opsgenie_alert_alias;
	var additionalComments = current.comments.getJournalEntry(1);
	
	var contentMap = {
		"state": "Added Comment",
		"additionalComments": additionalComments,
		"incidentNumber": current.number.toString()
	};

	if (alertAlias !== "") {
		contentMap.alias = alertAlias.toString();
	} else {
		contentMap.alias = current.number.toString();
	}

	client.postToOpsGenie(contentMap);
})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2017-05-11 08:07:37</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>fa0b6b9bdb26320030237d9ebf96195a</sys_id><sys_mod_count>16</sys_mod_count><sys_name>OpsGenie Add Comment</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="OpsGenie" source="x_86994_opsgenie">98838612db00320030237d9ebf9619ae</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="OpsGenie">98838612db00320030237d9ebf9619ae</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_fa0b6b9bdb26320030237d9ebf96195a</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2017-11-02 06:16:51</sys_updated_on><template/><when>async</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=fa0b6b9bdb26320030237d9ebf96195a"/></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_transform_entry_80876f42dbe1cf00b8755a77dc9619a4
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_transform_entry"><sys_transform_entry action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><choice_action>create</choice_action><coalesce>true</coalesce><coalesce_case_sensitive>true</coalesce_case_sensitive><coalesce_empty_fields>false</coalesce_empty_fields><date_format>yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss</date_format><map display_value="OpsGenie Web Svc Close/Resolve">0364e702dbe1cf00b8755a77dc961921</map><reference_value_field/><source_field>[Script]</source_field><source_script><![CDATA[answer = (function transformEntry(source, log) {
	var alertId = source.u_opsgenie_alert_id.toString();
	var alertAlias = source.u_opsgenie_alert_alias.toString();
	var incident;
	
	if (alertId) {
		incident = new GlideRecord('incident');
		incident.addQuery('x_86994_opsgenie_opsgenie_alert_id', alertId);
		incident.addQuery('state', '!=', 6);
		incident.addQuery('state', '!=', 7);
		incident.query();

		if (incident.next()) {
			return incident.sys_id;
		} else {
			incident = new GlideRecord('incident');
			incident.addQuery('x_86994_opsgenie_alert_alias', alertAlias);
			incident.addQuery('state', '!=', 6);
			incident.addQuery('state', '!=', 7);
			incident.query();

			if (incident.next()) {
				return incident.sys_id;
			} else {
				log.warn("[OpsGenie Web Svc Close/Resolve] Could not find an open incident with OpsGenie alert ID [" + alertId + "] or with OpsGenie alert alias [" + alertAlias + "].");
				return -1;
			}
		}
	} else if (alertAlias) {
		incident = new GlideRecord('incident');
		incident.addQuery('x_86994_opsgenie_alert_alias', alertAlias);
		incident.addQuery('state', '!=', 6);
		incident.addQuery('state', '!=', 7);
		incident.query();

		if (incident.next()) {
			return incident.sys_id;
		} else {
			log.warn("[OpsGenie Web Svc Close/Resolve] Could not find an open incident with OpsGenie alert alias [" + alertAlias + "].");
			return -1;
		}
	} else {
		log.warn("[OpsGenie Web Svc Close/Resolve] No alert ID or alert alias supplied. Skipping.");
		return -1;
	}
})(source, log);]]></source_script><source_table>x_86994_opsgenie_opsgenie_web_svc_close_</source_table><sys_class_name>sys_transform_entry</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2017-10-03 13:49:58</sys_created_on><sys_id>80876f42dbe1cf00b8755a77dc9619a4</sys_id><sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count><sys_name>[Script]</sys_name><sys_package display_value="OpsGenie" source="x_86994_opsgenie">98838612db00320030237d9ebf9619ae</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="OpsGenie">98838612db00320030237d9ebf9619ae</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_transform_entry_80876f42dbe1cf00b8755a77dc9619a4</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2018-08-07 15:28:33</sys_updated_on><target_field>sys_id</target_field><target_table>incident</target_table><use_source_script>true</use_source_script></sys_transform_entry></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_8a8c00cbdb32320030237d9ebf9619e5
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>true</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>false</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>sys_user</collection><condition>current.email.toString() !== ""</condition><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition/><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>OpsGenie Create User</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) {
	var client = new OpsGenie_Client();
	
	if (client.syncUsersAndGroupsWithOpsGenie) {
		var username = current.email.toString();
		var fullname = current.name.toString();
		var businessPhone = current.phone.toString();
		var mobilePhone = current.mobile_phone.toString();
		var timezone = current.time_zone.toString();
		
		var contentMap = {
			"username": username,
			"fullName": fullname,
			"role": {
				"name": "User"
			}
		};
		
		if (timezone !== "") {
			contentMap["timeZone"] = timezone;
		}
		
		var result = client.postToOpsGenieUserAPI(contentMap, "");
		
		if (result.getStatusCode() > 199 && result.getStatusCode() < 300) {
			var result_body = new global.JSON().decode(result.getBody());
			var userId = result_body["data"]["id"];
			
			current.x_86994_opsgenie_opsgenie_user_id = userId;
		
			if (businessPhone !== "") {
				var contactMap = {
					"method": "voice",
					"to": client.formatPhoneNumber(businessPhone)
				};

				var addBusinessPhoneContactResult = client.postToOpsGenieUserAPI(contactMap, "/" + username + "/contacts");

				if (addBusinessPhoneContactResult.getStatusCode() > 199 && addBusinessPhoneContactResult.getStatusCode() < 300) {
					var addBusinessPhoneContactResultBody = new global.JSON().decode(addBusinessPhoneContactResult.getBody());
					var businessPhoneContactId = addBusinessPhoneContactResultBody["data"]["id"];

					current.x_86994_opsgenie_opsgenie_business_phone_contact_id = businessPhoneContactId;
				}
			}

			if (mobilePhone !== "") {
				var contactMapMobile = {
					"method": "voice",
					"to": client.formatPhoneNumber(mobilePhone)
				};

				var addMobilePhoneContactResult = client.postToOpsGenieUserAPI(contactMapMobile, "/" + username + "/contacts");

				if (addMobilePhoneContactResult.getStatusCode() > 199 && addMobilePhoneContactResult.getStatusCode() < 300) {
					var addMobilePhoneContactResultBody = new global.JSON().decode(addMobilePhoneContactResult.getBody());
					var mobilePhoneContactId = addMobilePhoneContactResultBody["data"]["id"];

					current.x_86994_opsgenie_opsgenie_mobile_phone_contact_id = mobilePhoneContactId;
				}
			}
			
			current.update();
		}
	}
})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2017-05-22 10:14:55</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>8a8c00cbdb32320030237d9ebf9619e5</sys_id><sys_mod_count>34</sys_mod_count><sys_name>OpsGenie Create User</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="OpsGenie" source="x_86994_opsgenie">98838612db00320030237d9ebf9619ae</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="OpsGenie">98838612db00320030237d9ebf9619ae</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_8a8c00cbdb32320030237d9ebf9619e5</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2019-03-21 13:14:11</sys_updated_on><template/><when>async</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=8a8c00cbdb32320030237d9ebf9619e5"/></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_transform_entry_494a4172db1b9b40b8755a77dc96193c
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_transform_entry"><sys_transform_entry action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><choice_action>create</choice_action><coalesce>true</coalesce><coalesce_case_sensitive>true</coalesce_case_sensitive><coalesce_empty_fields>false</coalesce_empty_fields><date_format>yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss</date_format><map display_value="OpsGenie Web Svc Add Alert ID">45d9093adb1b9b40b8755a77dc961989</map><reference_value_field/><source_field>[Script]</source_field><source_script><![CDATA[answer = (function transformEntry(source, log) {
	var sysId = source.u_servicenow_incident_sys_id.toString();
	
	var incident = new GlideRecord('incident');
	incident.addQuery('sys_id', sysId);
	incident.addQuery('state', '!=', 6);
	incident.addQuery('state', '!=', 7);
	incident.query();
	
	if (incident.next()) {
		return sysId;
	} else {
		log.warn("[OpsGenie Web Svc Add Alert ID] Could not find an open incident with Sys ID [" + sysId + "].");
		return -1;
	}
})(source, log);]]></source_script><source_table>x_86994_opsgenie_opsgenie_web_svc_add_al</source_table><sys_class_name>sys_transform_entry</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2018-07-18 06:18:16</sys_created_on><sys_id>494a4172db1b9b40b8755a77dc96193c</sys_id><sys_mod_count>4</sys_mod_count><sys_name>[Script]</sys_name><sys_package display_value="OpsGenie" source="x_86994_opsgenie">98838612db00320030237d9ebf9619ae</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="OpsGenie">98838612db00320030237d9ebf9619ae</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_transform_entry_494a4172db1b9b40b8755a77dc96193c</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2018-08-01 02:54:46</sys_updated_on><target_field>sys_id</target_field><target_table>incident</target_table><use_source_script>true</use_source_script></sys_transform_entry></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_4b5e250bdbf2320030237d9ebf9619e6
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>false</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>true</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>sys_user</collection><condition>current.x_86994_opsgenie_opsgenie_user_id.toString() !== ""</condition><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition table="sys_user">nameVALCHANGES^ORrolesVALCHANGES^ORphoneVALCHANGES^ORmobile_phoneVALCHANGES^ORtime_zoneVALCHANGES^EQ<item endquery="false" field="name" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="VALCHANGES" or="false" value=""/><item endquery="false" field="roles" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="VALCHANGES" or="true" value=""/><item endquery="false" field="phone" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="VALCHANGES" or="true" value=""/><item endquery="false" field="mobile_phone" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="VALCHANGES" or="true" value=""/><item display_value="-- None --" endquery="false" field="time_zone" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="VALCHANGES" or="true" value=""/><item endquery="true" field="" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value=""/></filter_condition><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>OpsGenie Update User</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) {
	var client = new OpsGenie_Client();
	
	if (client.syncUsersAndGroupsWithOpsGenie) {
		var fullname = current.name.toString();
		var businessPhone = current.phone.toString();
		var mobilePhone = current.mobile_phone.toString();
		var userId = current.x_86994_opsgenie_opsgenie_user_id.toString();
		var businessPhoneContactId = current.x_86994_opsgenie_opsgenie_business_phone_contact_id.toString();
		var mobilePhoneContactId = current.x_86994_opsgenie_opsgenie_mobile_phone_contact_id.toString();
		var timezone = current.time_zone.toString();
	
		var contentMap = {
			"fullName": fullname
		};
		
		if (timezone !== "") {
			contentMap["timeZone"] = timezone;
		}
		
		var result = client.patchToOpsGenieUserAPI(contentMap, "/" + userId);
		
		if (result.getStatusCode() > 199 && result.getStatusCode() < 300) {
			if (businessPhone !== "") {
				var contactMap;
				if (businessPhoneContactId !== "") {
					contactMap = {
						"to": client.formatPhoneNumber(businessPhone)
					};
					var businessPhoneEndpoint= "/" + userId + "/contacts/" + businessPhoneContactId;

					client.patchToOpsGenieUserAPI(contactMap, businessPhoneEndpoint);
				} else {
					contactMap = {
						"method": "voice",
						"to": client.formatPhoneNumber(businessPhone)
					};

					var addBusinessPhoneContactResult = client.postToOpsGenieUserAPI(contactMap, "/" + userId + "/contacts");
					if (addBusinessPhoneContactResult.getStatusCode() > 199 && addBusinessPhoneContactResult.getStatusCode() < 300) {
						var addBusinessPhoneContactResultBody = new global.JSON().decode(addBusinessPhoneContactResult.getBody());
						current.x_86994_opsgenie_opsgenie_business_phone_contact_id = addBusinessPhoneContactResultBody["data"]["id"];
				
					}
				
				}
			}
			if (mobilePhone !== "") {
				var contactMapMobile;
				if (mobilePhoneContactId !== "") {
					contactMapMobile = {
						"to": client.formatPhoneNumber(mobilePhone)
					};
					var mobilePhoneEndpoint= "/" + userId + "/contacts/" + mobilePhoneContactId;

					client.patchToOpsGenieUserAPI(contactMapMobile, mobilePhoneEndpoint);
				} else {
					contactMapMobile = {
						"method": "voice",
						"to": client.formatPhoneNumber(mobilePhone)
					};

					var addMobilePhoneContactResult = client.postToOpsGenieUserAPI(contactMapMobile, "/" + userId + "/contacts");
					if (addMobilePhoneContactResult.getStatusCode() > 199 && addMobilePhoneContactResult.getStatusCode() < 300) {
						var addMobilePhoneContactResultBody = new global.JSON().decode(addMobilePhoneContactResult.getBody());
						current.x_86994_opsgenie_opsgenie_mobile_phone_contact_id = addMobilePhoneContactResultBody["data"]["id"];
				
					}
				}
			}
			current.update();
		}
	}
})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2017-05-22 15:20:07</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>4b5e250bdbf2320030237d9ebf9619e6</sys_id><sys_mod_count>49</sys_mod_count><sys_name>OpsGenie Update User</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="OpsGenie" source="x_86994_opsgenie">98838612db00320030237d9ebf9619ae</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="OpsGenie">98838612db00320030237d9ebf9619ae</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_4b5e250bdbf2320030237d9ebf9619e6</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2019-03-21 13:15:14</sys_updated_on><template/><when>async</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=4b5e250bdbf2320030237d9ebf9619e6"/></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_ws_operation_a8fd383cdbf6320030237d9ebf961931
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ws_operation"><sys_ws_operation action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><consumes>application/json,application/xml,text/xml</consumes><consumes_customized>false</consumes_customized><default_operation_uri/><enforce_acl>2f31b531db42430031fc540adc96191f</enforce_acl><http_method>POST</http_method><name>sample</name><operation_script><![CDATA[(function process(/*RESTAPIRequest*/ request, /*RESTAPIResponse*/ response) {
	var body = request.body.data;
	var alertId = body.alert.alertId;
	
	gs.info("[Sample] Processing message: " + new global.JSON().encode(body));
	gs.info("[Sample] alertId: " + alertId);
	
	var client = new OpsGenie_Client();
	var alertFromOpsGenie = client.getAlertFromOpsGenie(alertId);
	
	gs.info("[Sample] Response to Get Alert request from OpsGenie: " + new global.JSON().encode(alertFromOpsGenie));

sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>true</action_delete><action_insert>false</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>false</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>sys_user_grmember</collection><condition>current.user.x_86994_opsgenie_opsgenie_user_id.toString() !== "" && current.group.name !== ""</condition><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition/><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>OpsGenie Delete Team Member</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) {
	var client = new OpsGenie_Client();
	
	if (client.syncUsersAndGroupsWithOpsGenie) {
		var user = current.user;
		var group = current.group;
		var userId = user.x_86994_opsgenie_opsgenie_user_id.toString();
		var groupName = client.replaceForbiddenCharacters(group.name);
		
		client.deleteTeamMemberFromTeamInOpsGenie(groupName, userId, "name");
	}
})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2017-05-25 07:23:36</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>1025e7b7dbfa720030237d9ebf961937</sys_id><sys_mod_count>15</sys_mod_count><sys_name>OpsGenie Delete Team Member</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="OpsGenie" source="x_86994_opsgenie">98838612db00320030237d9ebf9619ae</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="OpsGenie">98838612db00320030237d9ebf9619ae</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_1025e7b7dbfa720030237d9ebf961937</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2018-11-27 10:24:06</sys_updated_on><template/><when>after</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=1025e7b7dbfa720030237d9ebf961937"/></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_7b1bfa5bdb3e320030237d9ebf961930
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>true</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>false</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>sys_user_group</collection><condition>current.name.toString() !== ""</condition><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition/><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>OpsGenie Create Team</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) {	
	var client = new OpsGenie_Client();
	
	if (client.syncUsersAndGroupsWithOpsGenie) {
		var teamName = client.replaceForbiddenCharacters(current.name.toString());
		var teamDescription = current.description.toString();
		
		var contentMap = {
			"name": teamName,
			"description": teamDescription
		};
		
		client.postToOpsGenieTeamAPI(contentMap, "" , "");
	}
})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2017-05-23 15:27:33</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>7b1bfa5bdb3e320030237d9ebf961930</sys_id><sys_mod_count>15</sys_mod_count><sys_name>OpsGenie Create Team</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="OpsGenie" source="x_86994_opsgenie">98838612db00320030237d9ebf9619ae</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="OpsGenie">98838612db00320030237d9ebf9619ae</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_7b1bfa5bdb3e320030237d9ebf961930</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2018-11-27 10:10:42</sys_updated_on><template/><when>async</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=7b1bfa5bdb3e320030237d9ebf961930"/></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_2fb5c292db00320030237d9ebf9619ad
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>false</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>true</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>incident</collection><condition>current.x_86994_opsgenie_alert_alias !== "" || current.number !== ""</condition><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition table="incident">stateCHANGESTO6^ORstateCHANGESTO7^EQ<item display_value="Resolved" endquery="false" field="state" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="CHANGESTO" or="false" value="6"/><item display_value="Closed" endquery="false" field="state" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="CHANGESTO" or="true" value="7"/><item endquery="true" field="" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value=""/></filter_condition><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>OpsGenie Close Alert</name><order>2</order><priority>1</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) {
	var client = new OpsGenie_Client();
	var alertAlias = current.x_86994_opsgenie_alert_alias;
	var state = current.state.getDisplayValue().toString();
	var closeNotes = current.close_notes.toString();
	var closeCode = current.close_code.getDisplayValue().toString();
	
	var contentMap = {
		"state": state,
		"closeCode": closeCode,
		"closeNotes": closeNotes,
		"incidentNumber": current.number.toString()
	};
	
	if (alertAlias !== "") {
		contentMap.alias = alertAlias.toString();
	} else {
		contentMap.alias = current.number.toString();
	}
	
	client.postToOpsGenie(contentMap);
})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2017-01-03 15:34:48</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>2fb5c292db00320030237d9ebf9619ad</sys_id><sys_mod_count>34</sys_mod_count><sys_name>OpsGenie Close Alert</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="OpsGenie" source="x_86994_opsgenie">98838612db00320030237d9ebf9619ae</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="OpsGenie">98838612db00320030237d9ebf9619ae</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_2fb5c292db00320030237d9ebf9619ad</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2017-11-02 06:19:01</sys_updated_on><template/><when>async</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=2fb5c292db00320030237d9ebf9619ad"/></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_transform_map_9e22120edb21cf00b8755a77dc96191e
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_transform_map"><sys_transform_map action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><copy_empty_fields>true</copy_empty_fields><create_new_record_on_empty_coalesce_fields>false</create_new_record_on_empty_coalesce_fields><enforce_mandatory_fields>No</enforce_mandatory_fields><name>OpsGenie Web Svc Create</name><order>100</order><run_business_rules>false</run_business_rules><run_script>true</run_script><script><![CDATA[(function transformRow(source, target, map, log, isUpdate) {
	var client = new OpsGenie_Client();
	var groupName = source.u_assigned_group;

	if (groupName !== "") {
		var groupEntity = client.queryEntity('sys_user_group', 'name', groupName);

		if (groupEntity !== undefined) {
			target.assignment_group = groupEntity.sys_id.toString();
		} else {
			log.warn("[OpsGenie Web Svc Create] Unable to find group with name \"" + groupName + "\".");
		}
	}
})(source, target, map, log, action==="update");]]></script><source_table>x_86994_opsgenie_opsgenie_web_svc_create</source_table><sys_class_name>sys_transform_map</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2017-10-03 07:50:33</sys_created_on><sys_id>9e22120edb21cf00b8755a77dc96191e</sys_id><sys_mod_count>47</sys_mod_count><sys_name>OpsGenie Web Svc Create</sys_name><sys_package display_value="OpsGenie" source="x_86994_opsgenie">98838612db00320030237d9ebf9619ae</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="OpsGenie">98838612db00320030237d9ebf9619ae</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_transform_map_9e22120edb21cf00b8755a77dc96191e</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2018-07-01 11:54:48</sys_updated_on><target_table>incident</target_table></sys_transform_map></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_f3ef5357db26320030237d9ebf9619bc
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>false</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>true</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>incident</collection><condition>!current.work_notes.getJournalEntry(1).contains("[From OpsGenie] ")</condition><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition table="incident">work_notesVALCHANGES^EQ<item endquery="false" field="work_notes" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="VALCHANGES" or="false" value=""/><item endquery="true" field="" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value=""/></filter_condition><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>OpsGenie Add Work Note</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) {
	var client = new OpsGenie_Client();
	var alertAlias = current.x_86994_opsgenie_alert_alias;
	var workNotes = current.work_notes.getJournalEntry(1);

	var contentMap = {
		"state": "Added Note",
		"workNotes": workNotes,
		"incidentNumber": current.number.toString()
	};

	if (alertAlias !== "") {
		contentMap.alias = alertAlias.toString();
	} else {
		contentMap.alias = current.number.toString();
	}

	client.postToOpsGenie(contentMap);
})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2017-05-11 07:32:28</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>f3ef5357db26320030237d9ebf9619bc</sys_id><sys_mod_count>24</sys_mod_count><sys_name>OpsGenie Add Work Note</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="OpsGenie" source="x_86994_opsgenie">98838612db00320030237d9ebf9619ae</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="OpsGenie">98838612db00320030237d9ebf9619ae</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_f3ef5357db26320030237d9ebf9619bc</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2017-11-02 06:17:42</sys_updated_on><template/><when>async</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=f3ef5357db26320030237d9ebf9619bc"/></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_transform_entry_7ec6fb0adbe1cf00b8755a77dc961999
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_transform_entry"><sys_transform_entry action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><choice_action>create</choice_action><coalesce>true</coalesce><coalesce_case_sensitive>true</coalesce_case_sensitive><coalesce_empty_fields>false</coalesce_empty_fields><date_format>yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss</date_format><map display_value="OpsGenie Web Svc Assign Group">a2567bc6dbe1cf00b8755a77dc961915</map><reference_value_field/><source_field>[Script]</source_field><source_script><![CDATA[answer = (function transformEntry(source, log) {
	var alertId = source.u_opsgenie_alert_id.toString();
	var alertAlias = source.u_opsgenie_alert_alias.toString();
	var incident;
	
	if (alertId) {
		incident = new GlideRecord('incident');
		incident.addQuery('x_86994_opsgenie_opsgenie_alert_id', alertId);
		incident.addQuery('state', '!=', 6);
		incident.addQuery('state', '!=', 7);
		incident.query();

		if (incident.next()) {
			return incident.sys_id;
		} else {
			incident = new GlideRecord('incident');
			incident.addQuery('x_86994_opsgenie_alert_alias', alertAlias);
			incident.addQuery('state', '!=', 6);
			incident.addQuery('state', '!=', 7);
			incident.query();

			if (incident.next()) {
				return incident.sys_id;
			} else {
				log.warn("[OpsGenie Web Svc Assign Group] Could not find an open incident with OpsGenie alert ID [" + alertId + "] or with OpsGenie alert alias [" + alertAlias + "].");
				return -1;
			}
		}
	} else if (alertAlias) {
		incident = new GlideRecord('incident');
		incident.addQuery('x_86994_opsgenie_alert_alias', alertAlias);
		incident.addQuery('state', '!=', 6);
		incident.addQuery('state', '!=', 7);
		incident.query();

		if (incident.next()) {
			return incident.sys_id;
		} else {
			log.warn("[OpsGenie Web Svc Assign Group] Could not find an open incident with OpsGenie alert alias [" + alertAlias + "].");
			return -1;
		}
	} else {
		log.warn("[OpsGenie Web Svc Assign Group] No alert ID or alert alias supplied. Skipping.");
		return -1;
	}
})(source, log);]]></source_script><source_table>x_86994_opsgenie_opsgenie_web_svc_assign</source_table><sys_class_name>sys_transform_entry</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2017-10-03 14:54:24</sys_created_on><sys_id>7ec6fb0adbe1cf00b8755a77dc961999</sys_id><sys_mod_count>3</sys_mod_count><sys_name>[Script]</sys_name><sys_package display_value="OpsGenie" source="x_86994_opsgenie">98838612db00320030237d9ebf9619ae</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="OpsGenie">98838612db00320030237d9ebf9619ae</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_transform_entry_7ec6fb0adbe1cf00b8755a77dc961999</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2018-08-07 15:27:10</sys_updated_on><target_field>sys_id</target_field><target_table>incident</target_table><use_source_script>true</use_source_script></sys_transform_entry></record_update>

sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>true</action_delete><action_insert>false</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>false</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>sys_user</collection><condition>current.x_86994_opsgenie_opsgenie_user_id.toString() !== ""</condition><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition/><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>OpsGenie Delete User</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) {
	var client = new OpsGenie_Client();
	
	if (client.syncUsersAndGroupsWithOpsGenie) {
		var userId = current.x_86994_opsgenie_opsgenie_user_id.toString();
		var subEndpoint = "/".concat(userId);
		client.deleteUserFromOpsGenie(subEndpoint);
	}
})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2017-05-23 13:45:07</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>2d79ee53db3e320030237d9ebf961902</sys_id><sys_mod_count>13</sys_mod_count><sys_name>OpsGenie Delete User</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="OpsGenie" source="x_86994_opsgenie">98838612db00320030237d9ebf9619ae</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="OpsGenie">98838612db00320030237d9ebf9619ae</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_2d79ee53db3e320030237d9ebf961902</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2017-10-20 15:25:26</sys_updated_on><template/><when>after</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=2d79ee53db3e320030237d9ebf961902"/></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_transform_entry_ad2afb8adbe1cf00b8755a77dc9619c7
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_transform_entry"><sys_transform_entry action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><choice_action>create</choice_action><coalesce>true</coalesce><coalesce_case_sensitive>true</coalesce_case_sensitive><coalesce_empty_fields>false</coalesce_empty_fields><date_format>yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss</date_format><map display_value="OpsGenie Web Svc Asn User">d8d9378adbe1cf00b8755a77dc961955</map><reference_value_field/><source_field>[Script]</source_field><source_script><![CDATA[answer = (function transformEntry(source, log) {
	var alertId = source.u_opsgenie_alert_id.toString();
	var alertAlias = source.u_opsgenie_alert_alias.toString();
	var incident;
	
	if (alertId) {
		incident = new GlideRecord('incident');
		incident.addQuery('x_86994_opsgenie_opsgenie_alert_id', alertId);
		incident.addQuery('state', '!=', 6);
		incident.addQuery('state', '!=', 7);
		incident.query();

		if (incident.next()) {
			return incident.sys_id;
		} else {
			incident = new GlideRecord('incident');
			incident.addQuery('x_86994_opsgenie_alert_alias', alertAlias);
			incident.addQuery('state', '!=', 6);
			incident.addQuery('state', '!=', 7);
			incident.query();

			if (incident.next()) {
				return incident.sys_id;
			} else {
				log.warn("[OpsGenie Web Svc Asn User] Could not find an open incident with OpsGenie alert ID [" + alertId + "] or with OpsGenie alert alias [" + alertAlias + "].");
				return -1;
			}
		}
	} else if (alertAlias) {
		incident = new GlideRecord('incident');
		incident.addQuery('x_86994_opsgenie_alert_alias', alertAlias);
		incident.addQuery('state', '!=', 6);
		incident.addQuery('state', '!=', 7);
		incident.query();

		if (incident.next()) {
			return incident.sys_id;
		} else {
			log.warn("[OpsGenie Web Svc Asn User] Could not find an open incident with OpsGenie alert alias [" + alertAlias + "].");
			return -1;
		}
	} else {
		log.warn("[OpsGenie Web Svc Asn User] No alert ID or alert alias supplied. Skipping.");
		return -1;
	}
})(source, log);]]></source_script><source_table>x_86994_opsgenie_opsgenie_web_svc_asn_us</source_table><sys_class_name>sys_transform_entry</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2017-10-03 15:09:05</sys_created_on><sys_id>ad2afb8adbe1cf00b8755a77dc9619c7</sys_id><sys_mod_count>3</sys_mod_count><sys_name>[Script]</sys_name><sys_package display_value="OpsGenie" source="x_86994_opsgenie">98838612db00320030237d9ebf9619ae</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="OpsGenie">98838612db00320030237d9ebf9619ae</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_transform_entry_ad2afb8adbe1cf00b8755a77dc9619c7</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2018-08-07 15:50:03</sys_updated_on><target_field>sys_id</target_field><target_table>incident</target_table><use_source_script>true</use_source_script></sys_transform_entry></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_f1dfa7afdb36720030237d9ebf961969
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>true</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>false</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>sys_user_grmember</collection><condition>current.user.x_86994_opsgenie_opsgenie_user_id.toString() !== ""</condition><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition/><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>OpsGenie Add Team Member</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) {
	var client = new OpsGenie_Client();
	
	if (client.syncUsersAndGroupsWithOpsGenie) {
		var user = current.user;
		var group = current.group;
		var userId = user.x_86994_opsgenie_opsgenie_user_id.toString();
		var groupName = group.name;
		var teamName = client.replaceForbiddenCharacters(groupName);
		
		var contentMap = {
			"user": {
				"id": userId
			}
		};
		
		client.postToOpsGenieTeamAPI(contentMap, "/" + teamName + "/members", "name");
	}
})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2017-05-24 13:29:32</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>f1dfa7afdb36720030237d9ebf961969</sys_id><sys_mod_count>17</sys_mod_count><sys_name>OpsGenie Add Team Member</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="OpsGenie" source="x_86994_opsgenie">98838612db00320030237d9ebf9619ae</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="OpsGenie">98838612db00320030237d9ebf9619ae</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_f1dfa7afdb36720030237d9ebf961969</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2018-11-27 10:22:14</sys_updated_on><template/><when>async</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=f1dfa7afdb36720030237d9ebf961969"/></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_transform_entry_57866ec3db21034031fc540adc96193a
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_transform_entry"><sys_transform_entry action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><choice_action>ignore</choice_action><coalesce>false</coalesce><coalesce_case_sensitive>false</coalesce_case_sensitive><coalesce_empty_fields>false</coalesce_empty_fields><date_format>yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss</date_format><map display_value="OpsGenie Web Svc Asn User">d8d9378adbe1cf00b8755a77dc961955</map><reference_value_field/><source_field>[Script]</source_field><source_script><![CDATA[answer = (function transformEntry(source) {
	var client = new OpsGenie_Client();
	var userEmail = source.u_assigned_to;

	if (userEmail !== "") {
		var userEntity = client.queryEntity('sys_user', 'email', userEmail);

		if (userEntity !== undefined) {
			return userEntity.sys_id.toString();
		}
	}
	
	return "";
})(source);]]></source_script><source_table>x_86994_opsgenie_opsgenie_web_svc_asn_us</source_table><sys_class_name>sys_transform_entry</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2017-10-06 11:39:23</sys_created_on><sys_id>57866ec3db21034031fc540adc96193a</sys_id><sys_mod_count>3</sys_mod_count><sys_name>[Script]</sys_name><sys_package display_value="OpsGenie" source="x_86994_opsgenie">98838612db00320030237d9ebf9619ae</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="OpsGenie">98838612db00320030237d9ebf9619ae</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_transform_entry_57866ec3db21034031fc540adc96193a</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2017-10-20 15:32:13</sys_updated_on><target_field>assigned_to</target_field><target_table>incident</target_table><use_source_script>true</use_source_script></sys_transform_entry></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_65961ee6dbc4320030237d9ebf96190c
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>true</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>false</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>incident</collection><condition>current.state.getDisplayValue().toString() !== ""</condition><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition/><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>OpsGenie Create Alert</name><order>1</order><priority>1</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) {
	var shortDescription = current.short_description.toString();
	var priority = current.priority.getDisplayValue().toString();
	var incidentNumber = current.number.toString();
	var openedAt = current.opened_at.toString();
	var category = current.category.toString();
	var severity = current.severity.getDisplayValue().toString();
	var state = current.state.getDisplayValue().toString();
	var assignedTo = current.assigned_to.name.toString();
	var assignedToEmail = current.assigned_to.email.toString();
	var assignmentGroup = current.assignment_group.name.toString();
	var workNotes = current.work_notes.getJournalEntry(1);
	var incidentLink = current.getLink(false);
	var sysId = current.getUniqueValue();
	var alertAlias = current.x_86994_opsgenie_alert_alias.toString();
	var configurationItem = current.cmdb_ci.getDisplayValue().toString();
	var companyName = current.company.name.toString();
	var callerName = current.caller_id.name.toString();
	var sysDomain = current.sys_domain.toString();
	var client = new OpsGenie_Client();
	
	var contentMap = {
		"alias": incidentNumber,
		"incidentNumber": incidentNumber,
		"shortDescription": shortDescription,
		"priority": priority,
		"openedAt": openedAt,
		"category": category,
		"severity": severity,
		"state": state,
		"assignedTo": assignedTo,
		"assignedToEmail": assignedToEmail,
		"assignmentGroup": assignmentGroup,
		"workNotes": workNotes,
		"teams": client.replaceForbiddenCharacters(assignmentGroup),
		"recipients": assignedToEmail,
		"configurationItem": configurationItem,
		"companyName": companyName,
		"callerName": callerName,
		"sysDomain": sysDomain,
		"incidentLink": gs.getProperty('glide.servlet.uri') + incidentLink,
		"sysId": sysId
	};
	
	client.postToOpsGenie(contentMap);
	current.x_86994_opsgenie_alert_alias = incidentNumber;
	current.update();
})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2017-01-04 11:25:26</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>65961ee6dbc4320030237d9ebf96190c</sys_id><sys_mod_count>52</sys_mod_count><sys_name>OpsGenie Create Alert</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="OpsGenie" source="x_86994_opsgenie">98838612db00320030237d9ebf9619ae</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="OpsGenie">98838612db00320030237d9ebf9619ae</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_65961ee6dbc4320030237d9ebf96190c</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2018-11-27 10:22:46</sys_updated_on><template/><when>async</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=65961ee6dbc4320030237d9ebf96190c"/></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_security_acl_role_78ce4dbadb1b9b40b8755a77dc96195b
sys_update_xml.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_security_acl_role"><sys_security_acl_role action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><sys_class_name>sys_security_acl_role</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2018-07-18 06:37:01</sys_created_on><sys_id>78ce4dbadb1b9b40b8755a77dc96195b</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>.x_86994_opsgenie.opsgenie_app_role</sys_name><sys_package display_value="OpsGenie" source="x_86994_opsgenie">98838612db00320030237d9ebf9619ae</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="OpsGenie">98838612db00320030237d9ebf9619ae</sys_scope><sys_security_acl display_value="x_86994_opsgenie_opsgenie_web_svc_add_al.*">6fbe49badb1b9b40b8755a77dc96198d</sys_security_acl><sys_update_name>sys_security_acl_role_78ce4dbadb1b9b40b8755a77dc96195b</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2018-07-18 06:37:01</sys_updated_on><sys_user_role display_value="x_86994_opsgenie.opsgenie_app_role" name="x_86994_opsgenie.opsgenie_app_role">9616dadedbb94740b8755a77dc961902</sys_user_role></sys_security_acl_role></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_transform_entry_4312bf86dbe1cf00b8755a77dc96191a
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_transform_entry"><sys_transform_entry action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><choice_action>create</choice_action><coalesce>true</coalesce><coalesce_case_sensitive>true</coalesce_case_sensitive><coalesce_empty_fields>false</coalesce_empty_fields><date_format>yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss</date_format><map display_value="OpsGenie Web Svc Add Work Note">f2f1b386dbe1cf00b8755a77dc96199f</map><reference_value_field/><source_field>[Script]</source_field><source_script><![CDATA[answer = (function transformEntry(source, log) {
	var alertId = source.u_opsgenie_alert_id.toString();
	var alertAlias = source.u_opsgenie_alert_alias.toString();
	var incident;
	
	if (alertId) {
		incident = new GlideRecord('incident');
		incident.addQuery('x_86994_opsgenie_opsgenie_alert_id', alertId);
		incident.query();

		if (incident.next()) {
			return incident.sys_id;
		} else {
			incident = new GlideRecord('incident');
			incident.addQuery('x_86994_opsgenie_alert_alias', alertAlias);
			incident.query();

			if (incident.next()) {
				return incident.sys_id;
			} else {
				log.warn("[OpsGenie Web Svc Add Work Note] Could not find an incident with OpsGenie alert ID [" + alertId + "] or with OpsGenie alert alias [" + alertAlias + "].");
				return -1;
			}
		}
	} else if (alertAlias) {
		incident = new GlideRecord('incident');
		incident.addQuery('x_86994_opsgenie_alert_alias', alertAlias);
		incident.query();

		if (incident.next()) {
			return incident.sys_id;
		} else {
			log.warn("[OpsGenie Web Svc Add Work Note] Could not find an incident with OpsGenie alert alias [" + alertAlias + "].");
			return -1;
		}
	} else {
		log.warn("[OpsGenie Web Svc Add Work Note] No alert ID or alert alias supplied. Skipping.");
		return -1;
	}
})(source, log);]]></source_script><source_table>x_86994_opsgenie_opsgenie_web_svc_add_wo</source_table><sys_class_name>sys_transform_entry</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2017-10-03 14:34:04</sys_created_on><sys_id>4312bf86dbe1cf00b8755a77dc96191a</sys_id><sys_mod_count>3</sys_mod_count><sys_name>[Script]</sys_name><sys_package display_value="OpsGenie" source="x_86994_opsgenie">98838612db00320030237d9ebf9619ae</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="OpsGenie">98838612db00320030237d9ebf9619ae</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_transform_entry_4312bf86dbe1cf00b8755a77dc96191a</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2018-08-07 17:35:20</sys_updated_on><target_field>sys_id</target_field><target_table>incident</target_table><use_source_script>true</use_source_script></sys_transform_entry></record_update>
